name: TWOD Adventure Extravaganza
description:
All from opengameart.org

  • Tileset: "Orthographic Outdoor Tiles" by Buch, public domain
  • Player Character: adapted from "Green Cap Character 16x18" by isaiah658, public domain
  • Fire sprite: adapted from "9 Frame Fire Animation 16x 32x 64x" by FoshyTakashi, licensed under CC-BY 3.0
  • Door: "Basic Door 32x32" by kungfu4000, public domain
  • Background music: "The Field of Dreams" by pauliuw, public domain
  • Win sound: "Win Sound Effect" by Listener, public domain
  • Game over sound: "8Bit Death Whirl" by Fupi, public domain
